price: Силердин үстүңөрдө биздин бийлик жок болчу. Тескерисинче, өзүңөр акыйкатка каршы коом элеңер.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭۖ بَلۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا طَٰغِينَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna lanā ʿalaykum min sul'ṭānin bal kuntum qawman ṭāghīna
